verbose_text: To discover whether the newly identified naive- or primed associated genes play a role in controlling pluripotency, we knocked down the expression of Gjb5, Scpep1 and Dusp6 in 2i-mESCs using a combination of short-hairpin RNAs (XREF_FIG).
evidence: expression of Gjb5, Scpep1 and Dusp6
